atk-abh03a6:10_0: That’s why I will listen to you.
atk-abh03a6:1_0: and surrounded by the assembly of gods.
atk-abh03a6:2_0: in the world with its gods, Māras, and Brahmā.
atk-abh03a6:4_0: And he is known as foremost in the world, supreme person, highest, and finest of people.
atk-abh03a6:5_0: It’s hard for the individual to develop.
atk-abh03a6:6_0: Whatever topic of discussion is approving.
atk-abh03a6:9_0: But now the meaning is easy to satisfy.
